SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BooleanDataPoint
Represents a data point that holds a boolean value.
BooleanRegister
This class represents a Modbus register for boolean values.
Core
 
CSVParser
This class is responsible for parsing a CSV file and creating data points based on the information read from the file.
DataBaseConnector
Singleton class responsible for connecting and interacting with the database.
DataPoint
Abstract class representing a data point in the system.
DataPointListener
Interface representing a listener for DataPoint value changes.
FieldConnector
Singleton class responsible for connecting and interacting with field devices.
FloatDataPoint
Represents a data point that holds a float value.
FloatRegister
Represents a Modbus register that holds a float value.
MinecraftController
 
ModBus
 
ModbusAccessor
Singleton class for accessing and interacting with Modbus registers.
ModbusRegister
Abstract class representing a Modbus register.
PollTask
Task used for polling Modbus registers at regular intervals.
SmartControl
SmartControl is a program that manages control and monitoring of various data points related to a smart energy system using Modbus communication protocol.
TimeManager
TimeManager Class This class allows to calculate a timestamp taking into account the time index of Minecraft Electrical Age and its time acceleration. (1 day = 10 minutes) You also have to indicate a number of days to subtract from the current time which will determine the time t0 which defines the starting time of the simulation.
Utility
This class contains some useful Java methods to manipulate Modbus data.
WebConnector
